titles.title: A bill to require the designation of the Federal building located at McKinley Avenue and Third Street, S.W., Canton, Ohio, as the "Ralph Regula Federal Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 12/10/2008--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of General Services to ensure that the federal building located at McKinley Avenue and Third Street, S.W., Canton, Ohio, is designated as the "Ralph Regula Federal Building."
